name: Skill Shot Darts - Skillz PvP
description:
Play the only Darts game where you can win real cash and great prizes.

Can you hit all targets and turn your Darts skills into real cash? Then embrace your inner champion and start your virtual Skill Shot Darts eSport career today.

Skill Shot Darts is powered by Skillz, the world-leading eSport platform for everyone. This means you can win real cash prizes and withdraw them anytime directly from within the app.

Get started with practice tournaments and play head-to-head against other players of the same skill level. Hit the bonus targets to maximise your score. Throw a perfect round for extra points on top and take home a cash payday.

Training tournaments are always free. Play as long as you want, whenever you want. You never have to wait for an opponent.

HIGHLIGHTS:
- The most realistic Darts feeling on the App Store. Throw some darts and feel it yourself.
- Skill Shot Darts is the only Darts game on the App Store that allows you to win cash prizes.
- Play classic 301 Darts in real-time tournaments against players from around the world.
- Play the fast-paced Bonus Attack game mode and break the high score.
- Safe & Secure withdrawals of your winnings within the app.

Start your Skill Shot Darts eSport career today for free. Game on!
